body.p: All discussion relating to log4cxx development takes place on this list. All CVS checkin notifications are also copied to this list.
You can browse the mailing list archives at the following location:
Subscribe to either the list or to the digest list:

li.p:
To subscribe to this list send an e-mail to
log4cxx-dev-subscribe@logging.apache.org.

To subscribe to the digest list sent an e-mail to
log4cxx-dev-digest-subscribe@logging.apache.org.

body.p: To unsubscribe send an email to the relevant email address:

li.p:
To unsubscribe from this list send an e-mail to
log4cxx-dev-unsubscribe@logging.apache.org.

To unsubscribe from the digest list sent an e-mail to
log4cxx-dev-digest-unsubscribe@logging.apache.org.

body.p: Please have a quick read through the guidelines, thanks.

p.strong: To prevent spam, we require you to be subscribed to the list before posting to it.

p.em: This is the log4cxx developer list, it holds discussions relating to the development of log4cxx not the use of log4cxx. If you have a question that begins with the word "How" or you are unsure as the the appropriate list to post to then you probably want to start with the log4cxx-user list.

body.p: Post to the list by sending mail to log4cxx-dev@logging.apache.org.
